sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import { contacts } from '../data'; import { EnvelopeIcon, PhoneIcon, UserIcon, DocumentIcon, ComputerDesktopIcon, MapPinIcon } from '@heroicons/react/24/solid'; import Resume from '../Resume2022.pdf' export default function Contact() { return(

How to reach me

{contacts.map((contact) => (
Email:

{contact.email}



Phone:

{contact.phoneNumber}



LinkedIn



Github



Resume
))}
) }
